## usesObject3D() function

Determines if a technique uses THREE.Object3D instances.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function usesObject3D(technique: Technique): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  technique | [Technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.technique.md) | The technique to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true if technique uses THREE.Object3D, false otherwise.
